turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good day Assistant Yes, please I wannt you to help me order four medium thick crust pizza in Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello. how can i help u today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes sure. what toppings did u want on those pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would want veggie lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did u want veggie lovers for all 4 pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please for all four pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, did u need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Give me a review of my order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so the order is for 4 medium thin crust pizzas. all veggie lovers. is that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $36.92 is the total. should i place the order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i submitted your order. it'll b ready for pick up in 35 mins. the receipt has been sent to your phone as well.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, thank you very much. No, that is all for now.
